qas.question: What country did Montini visit as Cardinal?
In what year did Montini travel to visit Africa as a cardinal?
How many foreign trips did Montini make as Cardinal?
In what year did Montini visit the United States?
Where did Montini like to use as a retreat as a cardinal?

context: As a Cardinal, Montini journeyed to <a0_0>Africa<a0_0/> (<a1_0>1962<a1_0/>), where he visited Ghana, Sudan, Kenya, Congo, Rhodesia, South Africa, and Nigeria. After his journey, John XXIII gave him a private audience on his trip which lasted for several hours. In <a2_0>fifteen<a2_0/> other trips he visited Brazil (1960) and the USA (<a3_0>1960<a3_0/>), including New York City, Washington, DC, Chicago, the University of Notre Dame in Indiana, Boston, Philadelphia, and Baltimore. While a cardinal, he usually vacationed in <a4_0>Engelberg Abbey<a4_0/>, a secluded Benedictine monastery in Switzerland.
